ing: 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
1 pinch chili powder, or more to taste (optional)
1 red bell pepper, cut into small dice
des: "Green papaya is usually found in Asian, Vietnamese, and Thai salads and dishes. I've taken the crisp crunchiness of green papaya and given it a Mexican/Tex-Mex twist! My kids love it when I use a bit less cilantro and chili powder."
ins:
Blend cilantro, garlic, lime juice, olive oil, brown sugar, chili powder, and salt in a blender until smooth.
Toss shredded papaya, black beans, corn, and red bell pepper together in a large mixing bowl; add dressing and toss to coat.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
